summary: PRE-COLLISION SYSTEM NOT OPERATING.  USING MANUFACTURERS PARAMETERS, THERE IS NO WARNING BEEPS. FLASHING BRAKE LIGHT ON THE DASH AND NO AUTOMATIC BRAKING, WHEN DRIVING OVER 10 MPH AND A CRASH IS ABOUT TO HAPPEN.  TOYOTA CUSTOMER SERVICE DENIES THERE IS A PROBLEM, BUT CANNOT PROVE IT WORKS IN THE HERE AND NOW, DUE TO SAFTEY CONCERNS..  WENT TO PHILLIPS TOYOTA IN LEESBURG, FLORIDA.  MASTER TECHNICIAN TESTED VEHICLE  ON HIGHWAY WITH ME INSIDE AND WROTE THAT PCS DOES NOT WORK.  SERVICE MGR CALLED LATER AND SAID NO PROBLEM WITH PCS.  TOYOTA CLOSED CASE #1706100949
